sentences.sContent: He devilled her during the tour.
sentences.sCn: 他在旅行中拿她打趣逗乐。

sentences.sContent: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.sCn: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.sContent: ...take a quick tour of the physics department at the University of California...

trans.tranOther: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc
to visit several parts of a country or area
